statements: DELETE FROM greenhouse_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM greenhouse_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND temperature < 25
DELETE FROM greenhouse_data WHERE device_id = 1 AND temperature > 25.0;
DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature_value < 20 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM device WHERE location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM alert WHERE device_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2023-01-01'
